title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part the term: (a) AWOL shall mean absent without
leave. (b) Business day shall mean
any weekday exclusive of legal holidays. (c) Day placement program shall mean a
program for youth placed with the division which is an alternative to or
includes a period of residential placement. (d) Director shall mean the Director of the

Division for Youth or the director's designee. (e) Division shall mean the New York State

Division for Youth. (f) Eligible
youth shall mean a youth placed with the division pursuant to section
353.3
or 756 of the Family Court

Act. (g) Parent shall mean the
parent or other adult with whom a youth may reside while in a day placement
program. (h) Program director shall
mean a person responsible for the operation of a day placement program, regardless of whether the program is conducted by the division or by an entity
under contract with the division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
178.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
